document_data.name: Fidia Penghyst
document_data.mainbody: '''Fidia Penghyst''' was a noblewoman from [[Baldur's Gate]] who died some years before the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: Fidia died sometime before the {{YearlinkName|1486}} and was buried in the [[Lower City Graveyard]], next to the [[Grand Mausoleum]]. Her gravestone praised the woman's lanceboard paying with a single inscription: "Fidia Penghyst - A Noble Lanceboard Player to the Last." Her grave may had been accidentally desecrated, and her body risen as a [[zombie]] by [[Nina Dortmell]], a talented child with a [[gift]], who was trying to resurrect her recently deceased brother.
